body: The MediaWiki of THI aims to help students of the Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Bachelor's to find everything regarding their studies in THI, life in Germany, and many more student life concerns. You can operate this page by going through the content and finding what you are interested for, or you can search for the things that interest you by using the search bar in the top right of the page. On the left you will find the navigation menu. *Keep in mind* - every Home page link has a subtopic for which another link is assigned.
